metadata.description: We are 80s kids raised by the musical activists of the Riot Grrrl movement in the early 90s punk and rock scene.Gala Grrrls are now leading the subcultural movement into Web3 to raise awareness and continue the fight against physical and emotional violence against all genders.Through art, our team will deliver compelling stories as well as educational courses on relationship red flags, risk in coercive control and stalking, and deliver parents firsthand experience and knowledge on how to protect their children from online predators.
metadata.name: Gala Grrrl #1
